function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unregulated or unmanaged activities impacting PCAs","Impact":"Increased risk of disease propagation and environmental degradation","Mitigation":"Regulate and manage activities through policy and oversight","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring systems, policy enforcement technology","People":"Local communities, wildlife, ecosystem","Owner":"Government, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Financial burden on PCAs due to lack of safeguards","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to diseases and environmental damage","Mitigation":"Implement social and environmental safeguards for lending institutions","Technologies":"Financial tracking and reporting systems","People":"Local communities, financial institutions","Owner":"Financial institutions, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Illegal and unsustainable practices in food and fiber supply chains","Impact":"Risk of disease spread and environmental degradation","Mitigation":"Enforce sustainable and legal practices in supply chains","Technologies":"Supply chain tracking and auditing systems","People":"Consumers, workers in supply chains","Owner":"Corporate sector, regulatory bodies"}]}
